Optimized multiplication of the rotation matrix with a general 3x3 matrix.

The total number of operations is 12m + 6a.
Matrix3d = RotationMatrixAboutX * Matrix3d

The total number of operations is 12m + 6a.
RotationMatrix = RotationMatrixAboutX * RotationMatrix

RotationMatrixAboutXTpl metapod::Spatial::RotationMatrixAboutXTpl< FloatType >::operator* ( const RotationMatrixAboutXTpl< FloatType > &  aRM) const [inline]

Optimized multiplication of the rotation matrix with a rotation matrix about the X axis.

The total number of operations is 4m + 2a.
RotationMatrixAboutX = RotationMatrixAboutX * RotationMatrixAboutX
